info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rrm-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG definitions
     for wireless rrm operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2016-2023 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Wireless
**Paths:** 34

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rrm-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-rrm-oper.yang)

dca-last-run.description: Time stamp at which DCA last ran

dpc-last-run.description: Time stamp at which DPC last ran

is-static-member.description: RF group member type. 0 for auto and 1 for static

run-time.description: Time it took to run the algorithm

dpc-config.description: Data related to transmit power assignment like transmit power update interval,assignment mode,threshold

has-joined.description:
True if the member has joined this RF Group.
         This field is significant only if the current group is a static RF Group.
         In all other cases a value of 'true' would be shown

nack-reason.description:
Reason why a RF group member could not join the Group.
         This is relevant only if the corresponding instance for 'has_joined' is 'false'

max-radio-num.description: Maximum number of radios supported for a given RF group

last-join-cmd-ts.description: Date and Time when the static member joined the controller

dtls-conn-status.description: RF group member DTLS connection status

max-radio-cnt.description: Maximum number of radios a member can handle

curr-radio-cnt.description: Number of radios currently associated to the member
